product_description: Kingspan Kooltherm® K17 Insulated Plasterboard is a fibre-free rigid thermoset phenolic product.

product_categories.category_name: Insulation, Barriers, Membranes, Air tightness systems

recyclable_offcuts_description: We try and send all offcuts to waste to energy recovery but this is not always possible so it will go to landfill when this is not possible.
reusable_description: If the product is correctly installed. It can be reused.
water_reduction_techniques: Yes 40.7% of water use at our Somerton facility is from harvested rainwater.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: We are currently trialing some electric vehicles to deliver some of our products around Australia.
modern_slavery_comments: We use the EcoVadis platform that rates suppliers.

compliance_requirements.link: Kooltherm K17 achieves a Group 1 NCC classification.

product_description: Kingspan Kooltherm® K10 G2 is a fibre-free rigid thermoset phenolic product.

product_categories.category_name: Insulation, Barriers, Membranes, Air tightness systems

water_reduction_techniques: Yes, we have four rainwater harvesting tanks that we use in the production process and office toilets.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: We are trialing some electric trucks to deliver product from site.
minimisation_design_strategy: 3% of production is our aim for any waste on a standard board. Our factory uses scanners and sensors to make sure efficiency is kept high.

product_description: High performing acoustic and thermal lining for soffits, slabs, and ceiling applications

product_categories.category_name: Insulation, Barriers, Membranes, Air tightness systems

standard_dimensions: Thickness 50 mm | 150 mm |Size 1200 Custom sizes available up to 3600mm
recyclable_percentage_description: Mechanically mounted products can be reused as they are. Autex has developed bespoke recycling machinery to reprocess uncontaminated waste back into reusable rPET raw material.
recyclable_offcuts_description: Clean uncontaminated off cuts can be repurposed. Autex has developed bespoke recycling machinery to reprocess uncontaminated waste back into reusable rPET raw material.
recycling_process_description: Mechanically mounted products can be reused as they are. Autex has developed bespoke recycling machinery to reprocess uncontaminated waste back into reusable rPET raw material.
water_reduction_techniques: We have dry manufacturing facilities. Waste water is not generated in the manufacturing of our products.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: Freight emissions are accounted and fully offset annually. Airfreight is avoided wherever possible. Packaging is fully consolidated and stock managed to reduce freighting TKM.
minimisation_design_strategy: Product is manufactured to standard construction sizes or made to order to suit specific lengths from 1.2m - 3.6m helping the reduction of wastage onsite, packaging and transportation loads.
risk_of_harm_posed_description: Potential to degrade into micro-plastics when landfilled or incorrectly disposed of in the environment.
factory_finished_description: Available in 3 standard colours. Flint, Charcoal & Flint Reclaim, options in white and black on request, conditions apply.
specific_installation_methods: When specified and installed using Autex proprietary concealed spin fix clips or other mechanical fixings product can be recycled. Adhesive fixing may limit reuse and recycling options.
type_of_packaging: Product is typically supplied in locally made recyclable cardboard packaging,  products may be supplied on reusable-returnable pallets if required.

product_description: R3.5 Ceiling Batt manufactured using up to 80% recycled glass for use in ceiling applications.

product_categories.category_name: Insulation, Barriers, Membranes, Air tightness systems

product_description: Acoustic Insulation for internal partition walls

product_categories.category_name: Insulation, Barriers, Membranes, Air tightness systems

recyclable_offcuts_description: Easy to be reused in other applications.
recycled_content_description: Whilst our EPD shows a recycled content of 65%, this is for calendar year 2023. YTD average recycled content for 2025 is 82%.
reusable_description: Product is recyclable and can be used following removal from building.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: Advanced compression technology is used to optimise amount of product per delivery. Sea freight is used to deliver to ports closest to job site rather than road transport which is much higher in carbon intensity.
minimisation_design_strategy: Product is designed to be installed in studwork installed @ 600mm centres without the need for cutting and to minimise offcuts.

product_description: Volcore non-combustible mineral wool core securely bonded between two layers of pre-finished steel

product_categories.category_name: External Wall Claddings and Facades and systems
Insulation, Barriers, Membranes, Air tightness systems
Internal Wall Linings, finishes and partition systems

recyclable_offcuts_description: Steel can be repurposed as can mineral wool
recycling_process_description: Mineral wool and steel can be reprocessed
reusable_description: Panels can be removed and reinstalled in a different location
minimisation_design_strategy: Panel layout to determine the optimal size panel, minimising wastage
installation_risks_description: Wear protective gloves, protective clothing, eye protection and respiratory protection.
factory_finished_description: 0.6 Thick G300S AM100 high performance steel with pre-painted superior polyester finish coat of 25 microns. Other high-performance products, Colorbond® Ultra, Colorbond® stainless steel are available to suit project specific applications.
type_of_packaging: Plastic wrapping to protect panels on delivery
